detailsOfAchievement: Activities The janajatis are living in remote hills and inaccessible areas of North East India. To provide them with educational facilities a number of schools have been set up in those areas. Separate hostel facilities for boys and girls are provided as the majority of those students belong to economically very poor families. Free food and lodging together with free teaching materials like books, pens, pencils etc. are also being provided to the students staying in our hostels. Computer Training We also provide Computer basic knowledge Extra Curriculum Activites: Self reliance programmes are being imparted in hostels campus which includes, Computer training, planation of orange, litchi, pinapple etc. Rearing of Poultry and Cattle, silk-worms, Bee keeping , weaving and knitting, cutting and tailoring for girls students and handicrafts training. Achievments: A brief details of achievements of the students or inmates of different schools and hostel: 1. Matric Pass 500 2. First matriculates in their village 120 3. Graduates 8 4. Post Graduates 3 5. M.Phil. 1 6. Teachers 10 7. Assistant Professor 1 8. GOVERNMENT OFFICERS 180 9. Doctors 1 10. ENGINEERS 3 11. Gezetted officers 8 12. Drivers 4 13. Class IV Employed 10

detailsOfAchievement: The VKIC aims to peruse, preserve, and promote the indigenous cultures of Indias North East. It concentrates on the precious knowledge and values contained within the native cultures of the region, revealing the unifying elements which create the magnificent mosaic of people and their ways of life, their beliefs, traditions, and customs. VKIC carries out this work through research and documentation of different communities, bringing to light the social and anthropological issues in them. Its activities support communities to strengthen their cultural roots, appreciate, and sustain their timeless traditional knowledge and belief systems. To achieve its aims VKIC organizes lectures, seminars, workshops in its own complex and also in others parts of the Northeast. Apart from its centre in Guwahati, its New Delhi and Arunachal Pradesh Chapters also play host to similar activities. It has successfully carried out field investigations, collected significant facts and information, some of which have been published in books and journals. Research and documentation has focused on Kamakhya, Adi, Rabha, Nyishi, Theravadi Buddhism, Dimasa, Sattra institution of Assam, to name a few. Due to its path breaking work in Northeast India, the institute has emerged as a major think tank in the sphere of cultural studies. It has built and sustained ties with intellectuals, researchers and organisations, which have resulted in a better appreciation of the ancient communities and cultures of the region.

detailsOfAchievement: The Welfare Organization for the Destitute Women, Infants and Childrens Enrichment and Enlightenment known popularly as WODWICHEE was founded in 1989 and registered under S.R. Act of 1860 in 1993 and FCR Act. of 1976 in 1999. It is also registered under Section 12A and 80G of Income Tax Act, 1961 Right from its inception Wodwichee has been committed to the cause of destitute women and neglected deprived children. In addressing these objectives and commitments WODWICHEE has been concentrating its humble effort on socio-economic empowerment, improvement of indigenous skill, education and awareness. Some of the major programmes and projects being implemented by WODWICHEE at present are 1.integrated programme for peoples training & education Support to training and employment project (step) Integrated project for rural women artisan shgs 2.integrated programme for care & protection for women & girls Swadhar shelter home and help line Short stay home at hailkandi (annex-1) Sensitization program on women labour & domestic violence 3.integrated programme for children and youth Composite centre for working children Integrated programmes for care of elderly Old age home at hailakandi (annex-1) Multi sevice centre for elderly 4.integrated programme for persons with disabilities Vocational training and workshop for person with disability Project for purchase & fitting of aids & appliances to disabled. 5.rural resource management & technology transfer Eco-hatchery project (production of quality fish seed) Integrated psciculture and composite farming project

sourceOfFunds.purpose: OUR ORGANIZATION CONSTRUCTED 61NOS OF INDIVIDUAL HOUSE HOLD LATRINE (IHHL) UNDER WSACHH BHARAT MISSION (RURAL) IN SRIBAR GRAM PANCHAYAT UNDER LAKHIPUR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT BLOCK. WE ARE ORGANIZED VARIOUS AWARENESS PROGRAM ON HEALTH

The Association organized with support from Axom Sarba Siksha Abhijan Mission, Cachar, Silchar has organized 24days durational vocational training programme to 01 no. of RSTC(Boys) under Salchapra Educational Block of Cachar district a view to develop skill and basic knowledge on Jute craft as well as Micron craft among the learners of RSTC and to facilitate them about self employment. Our organization could successfully been completed the Training Programme.

The Association organized various awareness camp on Environment, Legal, Kishan Credit Card and conducted sport, capacity building with support from public donation and NGO members contribution, subscription etc.

The Youth Shining Association conducted GP-EMEx at 13nos of Gram Panchayate under Lakhipur

The Association Conducted 02months duration training program on Jute & Macron handicrafts and Agarbati(hand rolling) training program at 09nos of NRSTC, RSTC under the jurisdiction of Cachar district of Assam state funded by Sarba Siksha Abhijan, Assam.
The Association constructed 39nos. of HH in Sribar GP under Lakhipur Development block, Cachar, Assam. The said 39nos of IHHL instilled successfully.

detailsOfAchievement: DETAILS ACTIVITIES CONDUCTED BY ZEAL THRILL FRIENDSHIP GROUP The Group tries to uplift the life of community people by providing various income generating activities through community participation. It seeks to improve up to a minimum standard of life to the marginalized community by means of their own effort so as to lead a life of self-esteem and dignity. Women are the pillar of society. If we want to march ahead towards progressive way we should emphasis the need to develop women group. Lower socio-economic condition, higher rate of illiteracy, male dominating society; poor health seeking behaviuor, are some of the condition which acts as resisting force for up-gradation of women folk. In this regard, Zeal Thrill Friendship Group initiates activities like SHG formation along with various income generating activities among the rural poor of the locality. Youths are an indispensable part of society. They have many facet talents, potentialities as well as capabilities. The Group tries to provide a ground to develop their potentialities in positive way to become a good citizen Organization focuses on games and sports as a part of youth development programme in collaboration with Govt. agencies like Nehru Yuva Kendra. Group is to preserve Rare Books and Manuscripts; as well as Satria Culture of Assam and in view of that Dharma Mahasabha was organized in collaboration with IMAGE & Alipukhuri Patekibori Satra, it seeks to maintain the rich cultural heritage of the state which is going to be extinct gradually. We need some solution to cope with the situation. Assam and entire NE Region is rich in biodiversity as well as various tropical ranges of forests. Presently the enrich biodiversity is facing a common threat by various man-made biodegradable activities. People are doing such kind of activities due to lack of knowledge and also poor socio-economic condition. Zeal Thrill Friendship Group, in such a state of affairs tries to preserve the environment through environment awareness programme and plantation in different places by observing the Environment Week every year since the inception of the Group, in collaboration with Govt. agency. Organization also focuses on Family life Education among the group of Adolescent and young people on its own sources. Apart from this organization also involved in any kind of government health related programmes. Organization has been engaged in Targeted Intervention Project on Female Sex Worker on prevention of STI/HIV/AIDS awarded by Assam State AIDS Control Society. Organization also address basic amenities of human being by conducting sanitation programme Assam is flood prone state and every year thousands of people are affected by devastating effects of flood. During such situation organization provides relief to flood affected people from its own sources. Organization also provides helping hand to meritorious poor students for their admission and to pursue their education up to secondary level. Organization is running one Legal Aid Centre at Dhing town which provides legal support to helpless poor ladies and other deprived community people during the time of distress.
